app.name: Wii Swiss Booter
app.long_description:
This booter finds Swiss on your removable media and boots it in native GameCube mode. You need to have a cMIOS installed.
To find Swiss, this app checks, in order: SD Gecko (left slot), SD Gecko (right slot), Wii SD (front slot), either USB port. On each, it checks, in order: "/apps/Swiss/swiss.dol", "/apps/swiss.dol", "/swiss.dol".
You can hold A to stall the app to see where it found Swiss.
